meanings.definition: Spent or used unwisely or carelessly.
meanings.sent2: The money was misspent on unnecessary things.
meanings.sent3: He realized his misspent efforts were in vain.
meanings.sent4: Her misspent opportunities haunted her later in life.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of his misspent actions were severe.

meanings.sent1: The misspent resources could have been used more wisely.
meanings.sent2: His misspent talent went unrecognized for years.
meanings.sent3: The misspent chances slipped through his fingers.
meanings.sent4: Their misspent energy left them exhausted and unaccomplished.
meanings.sent5: The misspent time could never be recovered.

meanings.sent1: The misspent opportunities led to regret.
meanings.sent2: Her misspent potential was a source of disappointment.
meanings.sent3: The misspent hours resulted in unfinished work.
meanings.sent4: Their misspent efforts yielded no results.
meanings.sent5: He felt the weight of his misspent time.
